code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{TextField,Box}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const JsonEditorField=_ref=>{let{label,value,onChange}=_ref;const[text,setText]=useState(JSON.stringify(value,null,2));const[error,setError]=useState(null);const handleChange=e=>{const val=e.target.value;setText(val);try{onChange(JSON.parse(val));setError(null);}catch(err){setError('JSON inválido');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:label,value:text,onChange:handleChange,fullWidth:true,multiline:true,minRows:3,size:"small",error:!!error,helperText:error||'Formato JSON'})});};export default JsonEditorField;
